product_name: Mountain Hardwear Canyon Sun Hiker Hat - Women's
long_description: Get some relief from the heat when you wear the women's Mountain Hardwear Canyon Sun Hiker Hat. Lightweight, breathable fabric and mesh ventilation keep you cool but covered on the trail. Nylon fabric wicks away moisture, dries quickly and resists wrinkling; polyester micromesh panels enhance ventilation. Underside of brim is dark to reduce glare. UPF 50+ sun protection. Women's Mountain Hardwear Canyon Sun Hiker Hat features an adjustable rear closure to ensure a comfortable fit.
short_description: Get some relief from the heat when you wear the women's Mountain Hardwear Canyon Sun Hiker Hat. Lightweight, breathable fabric and mesh ventilation keep you cool but covered on the trail.
